title: (x) highly ornamented geometric sans - ITC Busorama {Sebastian}
content:
Can anyone identify what font is used in this composition?

 [‹ (x) techno sans on Swedish national soccer jersey - Aura {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34025 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Script w/ swashes from Oh How Charming! event design - Bickham Script {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34095 "Go to next forum topic")
author: spasticrobot

comments.content:
Hmm not sure why the image isn’t showing up.

[Link](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.annunciate.org/image_dump/DIY_NOLA.jpg)
I think this may be the work of [Justin Kay](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.fontshop.com/features/newsletters/jul2006_b/), who we featured in a FontShop newsletter last year.
Or it might be the work of Si Scott - what is the context you found it in?
You can tell it’s not Si Scott because the ornamentation looks tacked on, not drawn.

It’s actually the work of a the talented motion and graphic designer, [Mitch Paone](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.dreamersinkaesthetics.net/).

[http://www.dirtycoast.com/product\_view.php?id=21](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004720/http:/www.dirtycoast.com/product_view.php?id=21 "http://www.dirtycoast.com/product\_view.php?id=21")
